History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Sunderland -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: This will be the first Premier League meeting between Nottingham Forest and Sunderland since the 1996-97 season, when the Tricky Trees lost 4-1 at home and drew 1-1 away that campaign. Sunderland have won five of their last seven league games against Nottingham Forest, with this their first since a 1-0 Championship victory in December 2017 under Chris Coleman.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Sunderland -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: This will be the first Premier League meeting between Nottingham Forest and Sunderland since the 1996-97 season, when the Tricky Trees lost 4-1 at home and drew 1-1 away that campaign. Sunderland have won five of their last seven league games against Nottingham Forest, with this their first since a 1-0 Championship victory in December 2017 under Chris Coleman.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won seven of their last eight Premier League meetings with Fulham, including their last five in a row since a 3-0 defeat in October 2022. The Villans last won six successive league meetings against any side when doing so versus rivals Birmingham City from October 2005 to April 2010. Fulham have won just one of their last 21 away league games at Aston Villa, losing their last six in a row since a 2-1 win in April 2014.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Osasuna - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Real Betis have won six and drawn one of their last seven home games against Osasuna in LaLiga, their best unbeaten run against the Navarrese side in the competition since their first 14 encounters on home soil between 1935 and 1989. After drawing their last match in the competition, 1-1 in May 2025 at the Benito Villamarín, Osasuna could take points in consecutive matches against Real Betis in LaLiga for the first time since January-May 2014.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.desc: This will be the first fixture in AFC Champions League Elite between Nasaf and Al-Hilal, Nasaf have won just one of their eight games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition and are winless in their last four such games. Al-Hilal have lost just one of their 14 group stage games against teams from Uzbekistan in AFC Champions League Elite history, a 1-2 loss to FK Mash’al Mubarek in 2006; they have scored in each of their 14 such games in the competition, scoring at least twice in 11 of these.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Tractor and Al Wahda; Tractor are unbeaten in home games against sides from UAE in the competition, while Al Wahda are winless in away matches against sides from Iran in the tournament. Al Wahda won their opening game of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign for the first time since 2007, beating Al-Ittihad 2-1 on the opening matchday of the 2025-26 season; the only other time they won their first two matches of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign was also in 2007.

programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Sunderland -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: This will be the first Premier League meeting between Nottingham Forest and Sunderland since the 1996-97 season, when the Tricky Trees lost 4-1 at home and drew 1-1 away that campaign. Sunderland have won five of their last seven league games against Nottingham Forest, with this their first since a 1-0 Championship victory in December 2017 under Chris Coleman.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.desc: Guardiola was a pioneer as a coach. A highly modern vision of football, he experienced both success and disappointment. Many coaches tried to imitate him, but very few succeeded. Has Guardiola kill football?

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.desc: All the goals in match day 1 of AFC Champions league Elite for season 2025-2026.

programme.title: PFC Nasaf (UZB) vs Al Hilal SFC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first fixture in AFC Champions League Elite between Nasaf and Al-Hilal, Nasaf have won just one of their eight games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition and are winless in their last four such games. Al-Hilal have lost just one of their 14 group stage games against teams from Uzbekistan in AFC Champions League Elite history, a 1-2 loss to FK Mash’al Mubarek in 2006; they have scored in each of their 14 such games in the competition, scoring at least twice in 11 of these.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. Real Madrid have lost two of their last four LaLiga away games against Atlético de Madrid, after suffering only one defeat in their previous 20 visits to Rojiblancos' ground in the competition.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Sunderland -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: This will be the first Premier League meeting between Nottingham Forest and Sunderland since the 1996-97 season, when the Tricky Trees lost 4-1 at home and drew 1-1 away that campaign. Sunderland have won five of their last seven league games against Nottingham Forest, with this their first since a 1-0 Championship victory in December 2017 under Chris Coleman.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.desc: Barcelona have lost two of their last five matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, twice as many defeats as in their previous 16 encounters with the San Sebastian side in the top-flight. Real Sociedad have lost 26 of their last 27 visits to Barcelona in LaLiga, with the only exception in this run being their 2-1 win in May 2023. They have suffered 67 away defeats against the Azulgranas in their history in the competition, at least 11 more than against any other opponent.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford have won two of their last three home Premier League games against Manchester United, as many as their first six home league matches versus the Red Devils beforehand. After their 4-3 defeat in May, Manchester United could lose back-to-back league meetings with Brentford for only the third time, after previously doing so in the second tier in December 1934 and top-flight in February 1937.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 13 meetings with Burnley in all competitions by an aggregate score of 46-2. Only against West Brom, Bournemouth, Watford, and Fulham have the Citizens ever enjoyed a longer winning run in their history. Burnley are winless in their last 19 league visits to Manchester City since a 5-2 win in March 1963. The Clarets have lost each of their last seven Premier League games at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool, winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds. Liverpool have won nine and lost none of their last 10 away league games against Crystal Palace – this is their longest ongoing unbeaten run away from home in the league against any side.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won each of their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions without conceding a single goal, while they last won four in a row at home to the Gunners in August 1969. Under Mikel Arteta, Arsenal have only lost more away games at Manchester City in all competitions than they have away to Newcastle United.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6 - Mini match
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 7 -Mini Match
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last five matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga and could equal their best ever run without defeat against Los Blancos in the competition, achieved in February 2016, also under Diego Simeone. programme.title: PFC Nasaf (UZB) vs Al Hilal SFC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first fixture in AFC Champions League Elite between Nasaf and Al-Hilal, Nasaf have won just one of their eight games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition and are winless in their last four such games. Al-Hilal have lost just one of their 14 group stage games against teams from Uzbekistan in AFC Champions League Elite history, a 1-2 loss to FK Mash’al Mubarek in 2006; they have scored in each of their 14 such games in the competition, scoring at least twice in 11 of these.

programme.title: Al Gharafa SC (QAT) vs Al Shorta (IRQ) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Al Gharafa and Al Shorta in the AFC Champions League Elite; Al Gharafa is winless in their two encounters against Iraqi sides in the competition while Al Shorta is unbeaten in their last two games against Qatari sides. Al Gharafa won their most recent home game in the AFC Champions League Elite, the last time they won back-to-back home games in the competition was a run of three games between May 2012 and April 2013; they kept a clean sheet in their previous home game, they have never recorded back-to-back clean sheets at home in the competition.

programme.title: Al Duhail SC (QAT) vs Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: Al Duhail have won only one of their previous four AFC Champions League Elite games against Al-Ahli, however, this win did come in their only home game in the competition against the Saudi Arabia team. Al Duhail lost their opening game of AFC Champions League Elite 2025-26 1-2 against Al-Hilal; they have lost each of their last four games against teams from Saudi Arabia in the competition, conceding a total of 16 goals in these games.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Nottingham Forest - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever meeting between Real Betis and Nottingham Forest – the Spanish side have lost seven of nine previous European games against English teams, losing most recently in the 2025 UEFA Conference League final to Chelsea. programme.title: Tractor FC (IRN) vs Al Wahda FC (UAE) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD2
programme.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite fixture between Tractor and Al Wahda; Tractor are unbeaten in home games against sides from UAE in the competition, while Al Wahda are winless in away matches against sides from Iran in the tournament. Al Wahda won their opening game of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign for the first time since 2007, beating Al-Ittihad 2-1 on the opening matchday of the 2025-26 season; the only other time they won their first two matches of an AFC Champions League Elite campaign was also in 2007.

programme.title: PSG vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Paris SG are the team Auxerre has played and lost against most often in Ligue 1. AJA have lost 10 of their 14 away matches against PSG in the top-flight in the 21st century. Despite having the same number of points and goal difference as Monaco, Paris SG is currently second in Ligue 1 2025/26. This is only the fourth time in the last 11 seasons that PSG are not in the lead after five matches played, after 2016/17, 2020/21 and 2023/24.

programme.title: Toulouse vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 6
programme.desc: Toulouse-Nantes is the only fixture to have ended in two 0-0 draws in Ligue 1 last season, with the last goal in this fixture dating back to February 2024. This could be the first fixture to produce three consecutive goalless draws in the top-flight since Reims-Nice between 2020 and 2021. Toulouse have won only one of their last 10 home games against Nantes in all competitions, that was on 7 April 2019.

Qatar Club vs Al Shamal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W6
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Crvena zvezda vs Celtic - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Crvena Zvezda have met Celtic twice before in major European competition, losing a last 16 tie 6-2 on aggregate in the European Cup in 1968-69. programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. programme.title: Montpellier vs Limoges - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Qatar Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe 2024 Highlight
programme.desc: The Qatar Arc de Triomphe Horse Racing Festival is considered one of the strongest races in the world, in which the most famous owners in the world, the best horses, the best trainers and the strongest riders participate. The horse Al Ghadeer was able to continue his successive victories, awaiting the crowning with the Triple Crown in the Emir of Qatar Sword in February 2025 after his victory in Qatar Goodwood and the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.

programme.title: HL - World series Triathlon - Dubai - Men’s Final
programme.desc: The world's top ranked Olympic champions competed for the titles of the last round ( Dubai ) of the World Triathlon Diamond League in an exciting atmosphere over long distances, including a 2000m swim, 80km cycling and 18km non-stop running. It is worth noting that the total prize money for this round was two million dollars.

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring Part 1
programme.desc: DTM. The embodiment of Motorsport tradition. Having just turned 40, the DTM combines a unique fascination and familiarity with an unmistakable dynamic, signified by the rebranding with a new logo! Seven different manufacturers – ten different winners on six brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) through twelve races are but one testament to the unique competitive balance that makes every DTM weekend a revelation! And with the addition of Ford, the palette of different brands is only increasing!

programme.title: Day 2 - Session 1 - QTerminals Qatar Classic 2025 -PSA
programme.desc: QTerminals Qatar Classic 2025 delivers world-class squash from Doha as the PSA World Tour returns to the Khalifa International Tennis & Squash Complex. Daily Glass Court action showcases fast-paced rallies, precision shot-making, and high-stakes matches from early rounds through the final.
